title: grade
content: ended up getting a 22 in chem and it caused my grade to drop real bad,how much do i need to score in 2nd isa and esa to get an A grade in it

comments.body:
btw u dont get gades in ISA bruh, u only get a grade at the end of a semester.  
There have been multiple posts on this topic, look ehm up.
bro can u just tell me how much I need to score it would be helpful I cabt find those posts ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

It doesnt work like that man, just study for isa2.

Esa is 50% of ur grade and they dont even tell us our esa marks, so u cant really answer that q
just score as much as you can bruh.
No. Use the FAQs. They were compiled for a reason.
I can tell why you scored that much if you can't even put in the effort to find those posts
